mapper.select: SELECT mo.name as name, us.name as own_name, us.text as own_text, us.selection as own_selection, mo.iteration as iteration, mo.startDate as startDate, rem.remark as remark, mo.textS as str_texts, mo.selectionS as str_selections, mo.frecuency as str_frecuency, mo.estimatedDate as str_estimatedDate, start.uri as str_documents, mo.textD as dev_textd, mo.selectionD as dev_selectiond, dev.uri as dev_documents, mo.textE as end_texte, mo.selectionE as end_selectione, mo.finalDate as end_finalDate, mo.finalRemarks as end_finalRemarks FROM Modules as mo LEFT JOIN Users as us ON mo.owner=us.name LEFT JOIN Modules_Remarks as rem ON mo.name=rem.Modules_name LEFT JOIN Modules_Dev_Doc as dev ON mo.name=dev.Modules_name LEFT JOIN Modules_Start_Doc as start ON mo.name=start.Modules_name WHERE mo.name=#{name};
